title: Bug 147845Generic abstract aspect hierarchies 3 deep or higher can fail when type parameters have bounds
description: The program below should compile happily, but fails with:[error] Type B does not meet the specification for type parameter 1 (A extends MyBase) in generic type Baseabstract aspect Middle<B extends MyBase extends Base<B {}^^^^^The test program:interface MyBase {};interface MyMarker extends MyBase {}abstract aspect Base<A extends MyBase {}abstract aspect Middle<B extends MyBase extends Base<B {}aspect Sub extends Middle<MyMarker {}
